properties.title: Are you eligible to apply for a water licence?
properties.description: Select Yes if you answer yes to ANY of the listed eligibility conditions. Eligible if you or your organization in British Columbia: the owner, entitled possessor, or having a substantial interest in land, a mine, or an undertaking where the water will be used; a holder of a certificate of public convenience and necessity; a municipality, regional district, improvement or development district, or water users' community; representing the government of BC or Canada, a commission/board managing Crown land or related undertakings, the Greater Vancouver Water District or any incorporated water district, or BC Hydro; or applying as an agent on behalf of any eligible applicant listed

properties.title: Is this application in relation to increasing the supply of housing units within British Columbia?
properties.description: A housing-related project must increase the number of housing units on the land/property.

properties.title: Is this application related to the North Coast Transmission Line?
properties.description: For PILOT release, applications related to the North Coast Transmission Line cannot be supported using AI Assistant.

properties.title: Is this application related to a BC Hydro Sustainment Project?
properties.description: For PILOT release, applications related to a BC Hydro Sustainment Project cannot be supported using AI Assistant.
